name: load_attachment
description: If the user's request is related to analyzing files and/or images, you can call this function to analyze files and images.

user_request.description: The request posted by user, which is related to analyzing requested files. User can request for multiple files to process at one time.

file_types.description: The file types requested by user to analyze, such as image, png, jpeg, and pdf. There can be multiple file types in a single request. An example output is, 'image,pdf'.

name: handle_http_request
description: If the user requests to send an http request, you need to capture the http method and request content, and then call this function to send the http request.

request_url.description: The http url that is requested. It can be an absolute url that starts with 'http' or 'https', or a relative url that starts with '/'

http_method.description: The http method that is requested, e.g., GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE.

request_content.description: The http request content. It must be in json format..
